column1: #Text=Becoming an Avon consultant will give you the opportunity to promote and sell Avon products to individuals in your local area and everywhere else in your country .
#Text=As an Avon consultant , you can connect with people to sell product face-to-face , or sell Avon products on your own personal blog or website .
#Text=To become an Avon consultant , you are required to sign up for the sales program with another Avon consultant in your area , or online at Avon 's website .
#Text=After you have paid the applicable registration fees and received training materials , you can begin selling Avon product and start earning commission on sales .
#Text=Continue reading this article to learn more about the steps you must take to become an Avon consultant .
#Text=Find a local Avon consultant in your area .
#Text=To find an Avon consultant , you can either call Avon 's customer service center at 1-800-367-2866 , or email Avon at " dearavon [ at ] avon.com .
